description: The Indian actress and her daughter had been isolating since testing positive earlier this week.
title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan: Indian actress taken to hospital with Covid-19
title_page: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan: Indian actress taken to hospital with Covid-19 - BBC News
maintext: News that the family, often described as Bollywood royalty, had been affected by the coronavirus sent shockwaves across India. This week, thousands of fans have held prayers for the family's recovery.
